overview.title: Overview
overview.content:
HEIC to PNG Converter is a free online tool that transforms 'HEIC format' images taken with Apple devices into high-quality, transparency-supporting PNG format.
By converting HEIC files (which cannot be displayed on Windows or some applications) to the versatile PNG format, you can easily edit, share, and print them. This tool is widely used for image editing, web development, and business document creation.

questions.question: Q1. What is a HEIC image?
questions.answer: A. HEIC is a high-compression, high-quality image format used in Apple products. Since Windows and some services don't support it, converting to PNG makes it easier to handle.

questions.question: Q2. Is transparency maintained?
questions.answer: A. If the original image contains transparency information, it will be automatically reflected. However, if there is no transparency in the image (like in photos), it will be PNG-converted as is.

questions.question: Q3. Will the file size increase?
questions.answer: A. Since PNG is an uncompressed format, file sizes may be larger than HEIC, but image quality is preserved.

questions.question: Q4. Can I convert multiple images simultaneously?
questions.answer: A. Currently, we support converting one image at a time, but we plan to add batch processing in the future.

questions.question: Q5. Are uploaded images saved?
questions.answer: A. No, uploaded images are deleted from the server immediately after conversion. We consider security and privacy important.
